name: CAST N
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, the sea level rises in seconds. A blue fish is discovered that will lower the sea level when caught, and a red fish that will raise the sea level when caught. Use your cast net to catch the blue fish and save the planet!

CONTROLS

[Hold]    Adjust the throwing angle

[Release] Cast the net

[Tap]     Pull the net

INSTRUCTIONS

Catch as many blue fish as you can. Catching red fish will raise the water level. The game is over when the water level rises above the player.

Created with crisp-game-lib
